title: Fort Frederica National Monument: Current Conditions
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Current Conditions             Alerts & Conditions         Alerts    Information        Preservation in Progress Throughout Park  Alert 1 , Severity ,information ,, Preservation in Progress Throughout Park  There are several preservation projects in progress in the park.  These areas have been flagged with safety tape.  Please take care to give a wide berth around these areas.  Visitors will still be able to see these structures, just not walk too close.
